value:
Edit Mjölnir's Strike Team:
Ally Pair Up units can be formed
for Mjölnir's Strike.

Allies paired up for Mjölnir's
Strike will not receive stat boosts
from their partner, but if the lead
is defeated, the cohort will remain.

My Summoner cannot be used
in a Pair Up unit, but will always
be on your team.

The Five Roles:
Teams are made up of five roles.

1. Raid: Has the ability to move
within the top 4 rows of the map.
Will not be attacked by foes.

2. Atk: Gain Atk+10
3. Spd: Gain Spd+10
4. Def: Gain Def+10
5. Res: Gain Res+10

Roles 2–5 have the ability to
move within the bottom 6 rows
of the map.

Special Slot:
If a Mythic Hero is part of the
current major season, has either
the Raiding Party Bonus or the
Defensive Team Bonus, and is
on your team, you can use the
special slot. (Strength of the
enemy team will be unaffected.)

The following types of Heroes can
be used in the special slot:

・ Mythic Heroes and blessed
Heroes linked to the current
major season

My Summoner:
You can use your summoner in
combat. Using your summoner
has no effect on the strength of
the enemy team.

The threat of the Dire Breidablik
is upon the kingdom of Askr!

$aIf deployed in a Shield battle in Mjölnir's Strike,
unit will be granted Atk+$a0.
$aAll stats+$a0

$aIf deployed in a Shield battle in Mjölnir's Strike,
unit will be granted +$a0 to all their stats.

Your summoner cannot be added
to a team via the Defensive Team
Bonus special slot.
Start the battle?

The special slot cannot be used with
this team because it does not include
Heroes that fulfill the requirements.
(More detail can be found in the Help
messages within Edit Defensive Team
in Mjölnir's Strike.)

The special slot cannot be used with
this team because it does not include
Heroes that fulfill the requirements:

・ Mythic Heroes and blessed Heroes
linked to the current major season

Your summoner cannot be paired
with another unit using Pair Up, so
the paired unit cannot be deployed.
Fight!
Summoner Aflame

$aDeals $a0 damage to foes within 5 rows
and 5 columns centered on My Summoner.
Vital Summoner

$aRestores $a0 HP to My Summoner and
allies within 3 spaces of My Summoner.
Ebon Summoner

$aInflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-$a0 on foes within
5 rows and 5 columns centered on My
Summoner through their next actions.
Shining Summoner

$aGrants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+$a0 to allies
within 3 spaces of My Summoner for one turn.
Cogent Summoner

Grants another action to My Summoner
that has already performed an action.
Winged Summoner

My Summoner and allies within 1 space of My
Summoner can move 1 extra space. (That turn
only. Does not stack.)

My Summoner and allies within 3 rows and 3
columns centered on My Summoner can move
1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

My Summoner and allies within 2 spaces of My
Summoner can move 1 extra space. (That turn
only. Does not stack.)

・ You may use up to 5 numbers.
・ The ＠ symbol cannot be used.
Select a filter and then the skills you would like to equip.
What are you like in this world?

My Summoner:
Decide what you look like and
how you greet your friends in
this world. Your summoner will
not be able to join in any battles,
with the one exception being
those in Mjölnir's Strike.

Edit Look:
You can change your summoner's
appearance by editing your look.

Edit Name:
You can change the name that is
displayed for your summoner
while greeting friends.

Edit Greeting:
You can change the greeting
your summoner uses when
visiting your friends.

Edit Accessory:
Your summoner can equip an
accessory by matching one worn
by an ally. There are also some
accessories that can be equipped
only by your summoner.

Copy Skill:
Skills can be copied from allies or
Combat Manuals and equipped on
your summoner. The ally that a
skill is copied from is not lost.
Equip whatever skills you enjoy
using the most!

Sacred Seals:
Any Sacred Seal equipped to an
ally can also be equipped to My
Summoner. That means you can
use the same Seal twice!
Lost to Love

This accessory can be equipped only
by your summoner.

Legendary
Heroes
4★ Special Rate

Maximum Lift:
The maximum amount of Lift
acquired when a raiding party
makes a successful attack.

The maximum will decrease
by 20 for each ally defeated.

Defense Lift Loss:
The maximum amount of Lift
lost from a Defense Team loss.

When defending, the value will
decrease by 20 for each foe
you defeat.
